text: Laurence Paul Fox (born 1978) is an English actor and political activist. He is known for his role as DS James Hathaway in the British TV drama series Lewis from 2006 to 2015. A conservative activist, Fox did not support the George Floyd protests and was against vaccination during the COVID-19 pandemic. He ran for Mayor of London in the 2021 election. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Politicians from London Category:Singer-songwriters from London Category:Musicians from London Category:English guitarists Category:Actors from London
title: Laurence Fox
